content:
To normalize the provided profile data, I'll follow the specified normalization instructions for company names, job titles, skills, locations, and dates. I'll also include a `normalization_notes` field if necessary to document any significant changes or ambiguities. Let's proceed with the normalization process.

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "VP of Eng.",
  "location": "SF Bay Area",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React.js",
    "Agile Methodologies"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions, Inc.",
      "title": "VP Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Sr. Software Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React",
    "Agile Methodologies"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions, Inc.",
      "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Expanded VP and Eng. to full titles; Standardized SF Bay Area to full location name; Removed '.js' from React for consistency."
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
- **Title Normalization**: Expanded "VP of Eng." to "Vice President of Engineering" for clarity and consistency.
- **Location Normalization**: Converted "SF Bay Area" to "San Francisco, California, United States" for a standardized location format.
- **Skills Normalization**: Removed ".js" from "React.js" to standardize it as "React".
- **Experience Normalization**:
  - Company names were already in proper case, so no changes were needed.
  - Expanded "VP Eng." to "Vice President of Engineering" and "Sr. Software Eng." to "Senior Software Engineer".
  - Converted date formats to ISO format (e.g., "March 2018" to "2018-03").
  - Standardized location format for consistency.

This normalized profile should now be consistent and ready for downstream clustering and analysis.
